short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Your all-in-one tool: access company career pages, interview experiences (option to listen), and LinkedIn productivity enhancements.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
🌟 Introducing Career Matrix - Discover, Listen, and Boost 🌟

It can be a bit tiring to remember all those companies and their career pages, right? Well, no worries! One click, problem solved. Feels good, right?

And finding past interview experiences can be a bit hectic and time-consuming. Let's make that easier for you too!

Simply hit the 'Add to Chrome' button, and you're all set to access our Chrome extension – voila!

Welcome to Career Matrix, where our Chrome extension serves as an all-in-one tool for everything related to your career journey. With Career Matrix, you can easily browse company career pages, explore interview experiences, listen to valuable interview insights, and supercharge your LinkedIn productivity. Plus, you can easily track and save the jobs you've applied for, keeping your job search organized and efficient.

**{{ 🌟 Features }}**
      👉 Matrix of Company Career Pages: Find Your Dream Job 🌐
      👉 Easily search for career pages of any company you desire. 🔎
      👉 Open multiple company career pages with a single click. 👆
      👉 Access interview experiences /
           └── 🔎 Easily search for interview experiences
           └── 🎧 Listen to interview experiences with user-friendly play, pause, 
                           resume, and voice controls.
       👉 🎯 Focus Mode/
               └── Stay focused and free from distractions while reading.
       👉 ⏰ Reading time/
               └── Discover your reading time in advance.
       👉 🚀 Boost Your LinkedIn Productivity/
               └── No more manual clicks on "Read More." We automate post expansions 
                        for you.
               └── Listen to LinkedIn post.
      👉 ⚙ Settings/
               └── Customize your settings to enable or disable specific features.

**{{ 🙌✨ New Features }}**
      🟢 Save and track job applications 💼
      🟢 Access Career Matrix via 👉 Ctrl+Shift+Q 👈
      🟢 View your career page last visit time ⌚
      🟢 Export saved jobs as a JSON file 📁

NOTE: Listen to Interview experiences (This feature is currently supported for GeeksforGeeks interview experiences and articles.)

Download Career Matrix now and take your career exploration to the next level!`
